name: Beeps
description: Beeps is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a classic box-like body and arms and legs. Its screen is unfortunately broken, but that doesn't stop it from being a valuable member of the WebtrES club. Beeps has been programmed with a charming personality and a knack for problem-solving. Despite its physical limitations, Beeps is always ready to assist others and contribute to the club's activities.
